パッケージ org.sxb.http.converter

Provides an HttpMessageConverter abstraction to convert between Java objects and HTTP input/output messages.

参照先: 説明

  • インタフェースの概要 
    インタフェース 説明
    GenericHttpMessageConverter<T>
    A specialization of HttpMessageConverter that can convert an HTTP request into a target object of a specified generic type.
    HttpMessageConverter<T>
    Strategy interface that specifies a converter that can convert from and to HTTP requests and responses.
  • クラスの概要 
    クラス 説明
    AbstractHttpMessageConverter<T>
    Abstract base class for most HttpMessageConverter implementations.
    BufferedImageHttpMessageConverter
    Implementation of HttpMessageConverter that can read and write BufferedImages.
    ByteArrayHttpMessageConverter
    Implementation of HttpMessageConverter that can read and write byte arrays.
    FormHttpMessageConverter
    Implementation of HttpMessageConverter to read and write 'normal' HTML forms and also to write (but not read) multipart data (e.g. file uploads).
    ResourceHttpMessageConverter
    Implementation of HttpMessageConverter that can read and write Resources.
    StringHttpMessageConverter
    Implementation of HttpMessageConverter that can read and write strings.
  • 例外の概要 
    例外 説明
    HttpMessageConversionException
    Thrown by HttpMessageConverter implementations when a conversion attempt fails.
    HttpMessageNotReadableException
    Thrown by HttpMessageConverter implementations when the HttpMessageConverter.read(java.lang.Class<? extends T>, org.sxb.http.HttpInputMessage) method fails.
    HttpMessageNotWritableException
    Thrown by HttpMessageConverter implementations when the HttpMessageConverter.write(T, org.sxb.http.MediaType, org.sxb.http.HttpOutputMessage) method fails.

パッケージorg.sxb.http.converterの説明

Provides an HttpMessageConverter abstraction to convert between Java objects and HTTP input/output messages.
